about: My name is Timothy Tse. I am a software engineer based out of northern New Jersey. I am also the proud father of two birds and two cats!
I enjoy working with a wide array of technologies. My goal is to help deliver modern solutions to modern problems.
I currently work at Quadpay, where I am a Software Engineer II on the Fraud & Risk team.
If you would like to see my work, check out the projects section below!
You can also check out my LinkedIn and GitHub in the contact section.

projects.title: This Site
projects.description: This site is fully open source. Technologies being used include Node, Express, Pug, and Bootstrap.

projects.title: PokerPlayer
projects.description: A poker playing program written in C#. End goal is to have a player vs ai poker games with multiple different games. Currently working on the analyzing of poker hands to determine hand type and winner between two hands.

projects.title: Discord Soundboard
projects.description: Discord Soundboard is a framework to simplify the process of creating soundboard bots for Discord. Initalizing it requires only two lines of code with all setup in a JSON file.

projects.title: "It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia" Soundboard
projects.description: This is a discord bot that operates as a soundboard for quotes from 'It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia'.
links: Invite this bot to your server!

roles.title: Software Engineer II, Risk
highlights: Responsible for decisioning and risk analysis services
Built Python service with FastAPI to calculate credit report features

roles.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Team responsible for development and maintenance of Datacor CRM
Created a sales analysis view with ReactJS
Prepared presentations and demonstrations of CRM features
